title: BLEU (3/4)

definitions.BLEU: In the literature, it has been found that the geometric mean of the BLEU* scores with n between one and four has the best correlation with human evaluation, therefore it's the score more commonly adopted, called MEAN_BLEU**.

summary: The slide discusses the BLEU score, specifically the geometric mean of BLEU* scores, and its correlation with human evaluation. It also introduces the concept of penalizing short candidate translations and provides an example with scores.
